name: vicare-flite
short_description:
This package is a distribution of C and Scheme libraries for Vicare Scheme, an R6RS compliant Scheme implementation; it provides bindings for the Flite C language library.

Flite (festival-lite) is a small, fast run-time synthesis engine developed at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) and primarily designed for small embedded machines and/or large servers.  Flite is designed as an alternative synthesis engine to Festival for voices built using the FestVox suite of voice building tools.
